mapper.select: select qb.id, qb.type, qb.content, qb.choice, qb.answer, qb.pic_url as picUrl, qb.model_id as modelId, qb.category_id as categoryId, qb.created_at as createdAt, qb.updated_at as updatedAt from question_back qb inner join question_back_assignment qba on qba.question_id = qb.id where qba.assignment_id =#{assignmentId} ::uuid

select ci.status = 0 from question_back_assignment qba inner join assignment a on a.id = qba.assignment_id inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id where a.id =#{id}::uuid;
mapper.insert:
insert into QuestionBackAssignment (assignment_id, question_id, score) values
( #{item.assignmentId}, #{item.questionId}, #{item.score} )
